type: TS LF Trading Bot Error - Snapshot Unexpected Error

definition.text: The Trading Bot found an Unexpected Error during the generation of a Snapshot. The trading process continued but the task of generating the Snapshot was aborted.

paragraphs.text: In the following section you will find the specific information received when this error occured.
You will only see it if you opened this page as a result of the error actually happening.
The following is the Error Message of the Exception that occured at the LF Trading Bot:
